item.title: Tip MySQL - Too many connections
item.description: If you are getting the “Too many connections” error, couple of things worth checking on the MySQL server: mysql> show processlist; .. The above will show the currently open connections. The second is: mysql> show variables like "max_connections"; .. The above will show the configured max_connections allowed. When you get this error, this value is less than or equal to the number of rows returned by show processlist.
